original_title: The Hidden Messages of World War 3
overview: Midnight Prophecy Movies also known as The Hidden Messages of World War 3 is a feature musical compilation which depicts the signs of the end of time. The emergence of the anti-christ dajjal and the second coming of Jesus to Damascus is portrayed. The battle at prophesized area near Ben Gurion Airport in Israel is depicted too.
title: The Hidden Messages of World War 3
